Actions.Name: Spore
Actions.Description: The Creeper puts down two intangible summons in free spaces in range 3. Characters that pass through these spaces gain spore infestation for the rest of combat. While they have a spore infestation, they are branded and gain regeneration 1 if bloody. When a character with a spore infestation is defeated, they release an explosion around them, dealing [D] as a blast 1 (self) area effect and poisoning all characters within. Spore infestations can be Cleansed (even from foes).

Actions.Name: Puppet
Actions.Description: A character with spore infestation (foe or ally) in range 5 is shoved 3 spaces in a direction of the creeper's choosing.
